response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this item at a price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the confidence I have in its ability to meet your expectations and surpass them. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition that allows both parties to benefit. Should you require any additional information or clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
